channel.title: Blogs on Matthew Liu
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Matthew Liu

item.description:
My First Personal Blog Site

I want to stand up a personal site where I can document my thoughts. The goal is to have a website where I can write blog posts about what is on my mind. I’d like to just write my thoughts into a file, if this was being published on the internet to be viewed in a browser, I would use something like Google Docs or Microsoft Word.
